p: Reference [ 45] presents a new silicon and Dammar-modified binder that reduces the use of synthetic binder and that has improved and more ecological properties. The optimal composition for this binder was determined, ensuring the best properties for impact stress, hardness, traction, and adherence. Reference [ 46] studies how the Dammar addition contributed to improving the rigidity, elasticity modulus, and hardness of a modified silicone.
